awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win.

fullplot: Matt Fletcher, a Mexican-American buffalo hunter is constantly harassed and humiliated by bandit general Chuy Medina. When the bandit steals his horse - the appaloosa of the title - he sets out to even scores; at the climax, single-handedly, he takes on the whole gang.
plot: Man tries to recover a horse stolen from him by a Mexican bandit.
title: The Appaloosa
